product_name: Camaro EVO Water Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring casually-styled outer shorts and an attached pair of neoprene liner shorts, the Camaro EVO water shorts keep you warm when the water is cold, but the waves are too tempting to refuse. Outer shorts are made of quick-dry stretch polyamide. Form-fitting interior neoprene shorts insulate and dry quickly. Zip fly with snap closure; 2 front pockets; 1 rear zippered pocket secures small items. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring casually-styled outer shorts and an attached pair of neoprene liner shorts, the Camaro EVO water shorts keep you warm when the water is cold, but the waves are too tempting to refuse.
